item.title: EKS + Prometheus + Grafana
item.description: Install **Prometheus** and **Grafana** on **Kubernetes**. Perform a **CPU stress test** to see the evolution of **Prometheus metrics** and **Kubernetes autoscaling**.

item.title: Kubernetes + EKS + Github Actions
item.description: Creation of a **website**, hosted on a **Kubernetes cluster**. Use **Kubectl**, **Kustomize** and **Github actions** to deploy it in a **GitOps** way.

item.title: Kubernetes + EKS + Docker + Node
item.description: Creation of a **web application** to convert images to black and white. **3 microservices** orchestrated by **Docker-Compose locally** and by **Kubernetes on AWS**.
